title: What will the Duchess of Cambridge wear in Pakistan? We predict her tour wardrobe
text:
On Monday, the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge will arrive in Pakistan to begin their five-day visit to the country, in what Kensington Palace has described as “the most complex tour undertaken by The Duke and Duchess to date, given the logistical and security considerations.”

The couple are expected to visit the capital, Islamabad, as well as Lahore, the mountainous countryside in the north and the border region to the west in a tour that will span over 1,000km, taking in a diverse range of destinations, occasions and communities.

From a fashion perspective, this will present some unique challenges for Kate: her packing list will need to include outfits that are modest and diplomatic, while taking...
